reviewText: Miss McDougal is very sexy. That is all. :D

Karen starts the DVD off nicely.  She's a very beautiful lady.  Nikki Schieler probably has better clips & when her short segment ended I was wishing she was PMOY instead of Karen.  Then Karen had a cute clip with cats during the credits where she had some cute facial expressions.  My only real complaint is that it isn't longer (on both accounts).

Not very often do I comment on a Playboy Playmate...This is an exception.  Karen McDougal was the perfect choice to be Playmate of the Year in 1999.  She is absolutely gorgeous from head to toe.  Fantastic Smile, a VERY attractive bust, perfect derrier, legs for days, and beautiful brown hair...She is not another one of those California Beach Blonde Bimbo's that has been Playmate of the Month or Year that Hef has been leaning towards the last 20 or so years either. She is drop dead beautiful, I enjoyed looking at her centerfold in the magazine and this DVD is a great addition to any Playboy Collector/Fan's collection.

Highly Recommended

Karen is gorgeous.  If you saw and enjoyed her layouts in the magazine you  won't want to miss this.  We see Karen making love in two shots as well as  some explicit slit shots we'd never see in the magazine.  You'll want to  skip the interviews with her mother and I suggest dropping Hugh a thank you  note for leaving her clothes on.

I agree with some comments of another reviewer, I too lament that there are no strip tease scenes featuring Karen being fully dressed and then doffing off her clothes to become naked, the way nature intened. But hey,  I'm not going to complain, for every single glorious second she is nude  makes this video better and better. Hats off to Playboy for making her  Playmate of the Year and for giving us this long loving nude look at one of  the rarest beauties ever.
Nikki Shieler is also phenomenal, and there is  a nice strip scene of her playing pool. But like Karen, every second and  every inch you see of Nikki, is a treat for your eyes.
These two ladies  are perfect! But for those of you who like natural beauties, there is a lot  of silicone between the two of them. But I say every ounce of it is well  used. Any guy who likes to look at pretty naked girls, will thouroughly  enjoy this!
